Publications

Adaptive Control Strategies for Autonomous Systems in Dynamic Environments

Authors: [Your Name], [Co-Author 1], [Co-Author 2]
Published in: [Conference/Journal Name], [Year]
DOI: [DOI Number]

Abstract:
This paper presents novel adaptive control strategies for autonomous systems operating in dynamic and uncertain environments. We introduce a framework that combines machine learning techniques with traditional control theory to enable real-time adaptation to changing conditions.

Keywords: Autonomous Systems, Adaptive Control, Machine Learning, Robotics
